tasks.label: test
tasks.command: numTests=$(find ../tests/input -type f | wc -l); rm -f ../tests/output/*; testsPassed=0; testsFailed=0; for ((i=1; i <= $numTests; i++)) do ./main.exe < ../tests/input/$i.txt > ../tests/output/$i.txt; if cmp -s ../tests/output/$i.txt ../tests/answer/$i.txt; then echo "Test $i passed"; ((testsPassed++)); else echo "Test $i failed"; ((testsFailed++)); fi; done; echo "Tests passed: $testsPassed"; echo "Tests failed: $testsFailed"
